chooseUS.title: Why choose us?
chooseUS.1: More than 17 years of successful work

about.title: WELDINGRAIL
about.text-1: One of the world's leading manufacturers of equipment for flash butt welding of rails using the flash method.
about.text-2: Today, our experience spans 2,000 machines and 13 countries around the world, including the USA, Canada, China, France, Iran, Malaysia, Austria, Morocco, Poland and others, accounting for 60% of the world fleet of contact rail welding machines.
